name: AntiDote
description:
Our founders’ motto, reflects the token name “Antidote” means ``Cure``
Why Antidote
Our founders believe to provide corrective measures to all the problems in the world. From the climatic change to electric vehicles, from Wildlife to COVID19 vaccinations, from slums to north pole snow, from charity to megaproject investments, from cryptocurrencies to droughts in third world countries. We believe every problem has solutions.
